ANU.name: Blair Williams
interest: Additional research interests include: feminist theory, Australian politics, women politicians, media analysis, post-structuralism, critical theory, queer theory, LGBTQIA+ rights and refugee politics.
ANU.biography: My research and activism have garnered maintstream media attention, frequently appearing on radio, television and in newspapers.
